item-1.question: Do you offer a free trial?
item-1.answer: Yes, we offer a 7-day free trial.

item-2.question: How do I cancel my subscription?
item-2.answer: You can cancel your subscription by visiting the billing page.

item-3.question: Can I change my plan?
item-3.answer: Yes, you can change your plan at any time by visiting the billing page.

item-4.question: What is the refund policy?
item-4.answer: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee if you are not happy with our product.

item-5.question: Can't find what you're looking for?
item-5.answer: Please contact our customer support team at support@mksaas.com

item-1.name: Jonathan Yombo
item-1.quote: MkSaaS is really extraordinary and very practical, no need to break your head. A real gold mine.

item-2.name: Yves Kalume
item-2.quote: With no experience in webdesign I just redesigned my entire website in a few minutes with tailwindcss thanks to MkSaaS.

item-3.name: Yucel Faruksahan
item-3.quote: Great work on MkSaaS template. This is one of the best personal website that I have seen so far :)

item-4.name: Anonymous author
item-4.quote: I downloaded the one of MkSaaS template which is very clear to understand at the start and you could modify the codes/blocks to fit perfectly on your purpose of the page.

item-5.name: Shekinah Tshiokufila
item-5.quote: MkSaaS is redefining the standard of web design, with these blocks it provides an easy and efficient way for those who love beauty but may lack the time to implement it.

item-6.name: Oketa Fred
item-6.quote: I absolutely love MkSaaS! The component blocks are beautifully designed and easy to use, which makes creating a great-looking website a breeze.

item-7.name: Zeki
item-7.quote: MkSaaS is the perfect fusion of simplicity and versatility, enabling us to create UIs that are as stunning as they are user-friendly.

item-8.name: Joseph Kitheka
item-8.quote: MkSaaS has transformed the way I develop web applications. Their extensive collection of UI components, blocks, and templates has significantly accelerated my workflow.

item-9.name: Khatab Wedaa
item-9.quote: MkSaaS is an elegant, clean, and responsive tailwind css components it's very helpful to start fast with your project.

item-10.name: Rodrigo Aguilar
item-10.quote: I love MkSaaS ‚ù§Ô∏è. The component blocks are well-structured, simple to use, and beautifully designed. It makes it really easy to have a good-looking website in no time.

item-11.name: Eric Ampire
item-11.quote: MkSaaS templates are the perfect solution for anyone who wants to create a beautiful and functional website without any web design experience.

item-12.name: Roland Tubonge
item-12.quote: MkSaaS is so well designed that even with a very poor knowledge of web design you can do miracles. Let yourself be seduced!

meta.title: What Is the TOTR (TOT–Ø, –¢–æ—Ç—è) Meme? Meaning & Origin
meta.description: Understand the viral TOTR/TOT–Ø/–¢–æ—Ç—è meme in 60 seconds ‚Äî meaning, origin timeline, spellings, and how it relates to –ü–´.

hero.title: TOTR Meme (TOT–Ø, –¢–æ—Ç—è) ‚Äî Meaning & Origin
hero.subtitle: A quick primer on the Russian SpongeBob brainrot trend that took over TikTok.

paragraphs: TOTR is the transliteration of the Russian word ‚Äú–¢–æ—Ç—è‚Äù, the chant shouted by two pantless SpongeBobs in a viral TikTok posted on September 1, 2025. Fans also spell it as TOT–Ø, totia or totya when captioning memes outside Cyrillic platforms.

The original upload by TikToker @ddghfjwiedi3929 paired the scene with a slowed remix of ‚ÄòStay‚Äô by The Kid LAROI & Justin Bieber. Within two weeks the clip crossed 2M views and inspired countless remakes, 3D renders and music edits across Russian-speaking circles.

As the format spread globally, TOTR started appearing alongside other brainrot memes like –ü–´. The core formula stays the same: two SpongeBobs sliding across the screen, the glowing ‚Äú–¢–æ—Ç—è ‚ù§Ô∏è‚Äù text, and the Stay remix pulsating in the background.
Use our generator to recreate the meme safely with parody-ready assets, compare it with the –ü–´ format, and explore the full timeline before you publish your own edit.

hero.title: TOT–Ø Meme: Story, Soundtrack & Fan Culture Explained
hero.subtitle: Follow the viral rise of TOT–Ø ‚Äî from the original SpongeBob clip to worldwide brainrot edits. Watch key videos, learn the timeline, and collect ideas for your own remix.

spotlight.title: Why TOT–Ø blew up
items: Launched by a September 2025 TikTok using a slowed remix of ‚ÄúStay‚Äù.
Defined by two pantless SpongeBobs shouting the phrase ‚Äú–¢–æ—Ç—è‚Äù.
Intertwined with –ü–´ and other multilingual brainrot memes.
Spawned 3D renders, AI remasters, lyric edits, and mashups.

videos.title: Trending TOT–Ø video playlists
videos.description: Curated YouTube searches showing original uploads, remixes, and the TOTR vs –ü–´ rivalry.

comparison.title: TOT–Ø vs –ü–´ showdown
comparison.description: Fan edits contrasting the two brainrot icons, polls, and storylines.

remix.title: Remix compilation
remix.description: Accelerated mixes, 3D animations, lyric-caption remasters, and more.

origin.title: First TOT–Ø clip
origin.description: @ddghfjwiedi3929 posts the original SpongeBob duet with the Stay remix, hitting 2M views fast.

remix.title: Remix explosion
remix.description: 3D renders and lyric caption edits push the format beyond Russian TikTok.

vs.title: TOT–Ø vs –ü–´
vs.description: Fan edits compare the two memes, spawning polls and cinematic mashups.

global.title: Global spread
global.description: The hashtag tops 4M posts, crossing into Roblox, Bilibili, and western meme compilations.

guide.title: How to create TOT–Ø edits
steps: Start with a template: original walk cycle, hug variant, or dance loop.
Keep the ‚Äú–¢–æ—Ç—è ‚ù§Ô∏è‚Äù text or add bilingual captions for wider audiences.
Pair it with the Stay remix (slowed, nightcore, or your own mix).
Layer 3D renders, AI recolors, subtitles, or lyric cards for extra energy.
Close with TOTR/TOT–Ø/P–´ easter eggs or polls to spark engagement.

cta.title: Join the TOT–Ø creator community
cta.description: Use our generator to craft TOT–Ø/TOTR edits or grab the template pack to start offline.

origin.question: Where did TOT–Ø first go viral?
origin.answer: On September 1, 2025 when TikToker @ddghfjwiedi3929 uploaded the SpongeBob duo with the Stay remix, crossing a million views within days.

music.question: What music is used in TOT–Ø clips?
music.answer: Most edits still use the slowed or remixed version of ‚ÄúStay‚Äù by The Kid LAROI & Justin Bieber, though creators experiment with other brainrot tracks.

copyright.question: Can I monetise TOT–Ø content?
copyright.answer: The format involves SpongeBob characters (Nickelodeon/Viacom) and licensed music. Seek appropriate permissions for commercial use or swap in royalty-free assets.
